name: Tiny Love Quest
description:
Creative Jam 13eme Édition

Lovesicks and alone, Gus escapes from his cage and embarks on a quest to be reunited with his one and only, his Petunia.

Extra Crunchy:

  • Benaissa Benchaa - Artiste
  • Maxime Hardy - Programmeur
  • Nicholas Hétu -Artiste
  • Patrick Racine - Artiste
  • Inés Setbel - Artiste
  • Alexandre Tomasino - Artiste
